translations: v.低空扫射（或轰炸）（strafe 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: I asked, "Don't those planes strafing the road bother you?"
sentences.translation: 我问“这些扫射的飞机没打扰你么？”

sentences.sentence: Allied strafing attack - Normandy - 1944 - Gun camera footage ?
sentences.translation: 盟军扫射攻击-诺曼底- 1944 -枪相机镜头？

sentences.sentence: When the fighting gets really close, the F-35 has a 25 mm gun for strafing.
sentences.translation: 当战斗进行到很近距离时，F-35还可以使用一门25毫米机炮进行扫射。
